name: RKXK
description:
RK(ology) XK(vation) is the archaeology game for people who love fossils and relics, but hate the tedious and minute work of unearthing them. After all, why dig it out carefully, when you can use explosives? Explore the depths of the earth, uncover ancient bones and artifacts, and try not to get killed along the way.

At your disposal you have:

  • A drill. Brings you deeper and deeper into the earth, but breaks anything fragile.
  • A shovel. Lets you explore horizontally.
  • A brush. Use this to dust off found artifacts before collecting.
  • Bombs - USE WITH CAUTION!

Controls

  • A/D to move left/right.
  • Space to jump.
  • Click to use current tool.
  • 1-4 to switch tools.
